SEARCH
Package game

Class ManagerOfCharacters

java.lang.Object
game.ManagerOfCharacters
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ManagerOfCharacters extends Object implements Serializable
ManagerOfCharacters represents Model from MVC design pattern. Handles whole data and logic and communicates with controller (MVC)
Since:
1.3.2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Å imon Vinkler

    • register

      public boolean register(String inputUsername, String inputPassword, String repeatedPassword) throws IncorrectRegistrationData
      Handles the registration process of user, guides user through the entrance portal of the application If user already has an account, then is being redirected to the log-in page/stage.
      Parameters:
      inputUsername - represents username provided during registration
      inputPassword - represents password provided during registration
      repeatedPassword - represents repeated password provided during registration for correctness of the credentials
      Returns:
      boolean value based on the success state of the process
      Throws:
      IncorrectRegistrationData

    • setGameMode

      public void setGameMode(String gameMode)
      setGameMode() sets the game mode based on the choice the user has made
      Parameters:
      gameMode - represents name of the game mode

    • vehicleSetup

      public boolean vehicleSetup(String vehicleName)
      This method sets up the user's vehicle based on the choice the user has made and handles also the budget and other dependencies
      Parameters:
      vehicleName - represents name/factory identity of the requested vehicle
      Returns:
      boolean value based on the success state of the process
